channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)

item.title: CVE-2020-4400|2024-09-17T02:31:46.925Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 179478.
